function.name: calculate
function.description: calculate mathematical expressions, can only use numbers directly; cannot call other functions

expression.description: The mathematical expression to be evaluated, it can only use numbers

function.name: get_planet_mass
function.description: return the mass of a given planet

function.name: import_git_repo
function.description: this function will take a git repository url, clone the repository, extract the commit log, import it with one document per commit in a database, and index all commit in a vector database. If the repository url is not known, it should be search from internet

repoPath.description: the url to clone the git repository

repoName.description: the name of the git repository

function.name: think_code
function.description: this function will call a helpful coding agent that has the ability to understand code and choose which tools to use for coding tasks. It can break down code related tasks.

function.name: ask_repo
function.description: this function will take a git repository that has been already indexed in couchbase, run a vector search and ask a question specialized code agent. The repo must have been imported before this function is used

repoName.description: the name of the git repository

question.description: the question the agent will ask

function.name: search_internet
function.description: this function will call the duckduck go search engine, retrieve the top 10 links returned by the search in markdown format.

search.description: the search terms to be queried
